name: Audeze Maxwell Wireless
description: Premium planar magnetic gaming headset with 90mm drivers. Features Dolby Atmos, lossless 2.4GHz wireless, and audiophile-grade sound in a gaming package.

reviews.review_text: Planar magnetic for gaming. Sound is unmatched.
Heavy but sound quality makes you forget the weight.
Needs EQ for some games but incredible potential.
